attributes.action: Give time off sentence for prisoners due to the brutal covid 19 regime
attributes.additional_details:
Harsh 23hr plus bang up-  weekends up to 31 hours.  Family ties breaking due no no visits.No educational courses/work. These people are our 
Loved ones.  they have had to suffer adversely during this pandemic. 10 months and counting with still no end in sight!   They said the bang up is to protect the prisoners but thats not even true as cases are rising massively with no adequate vaccine programme in place to halt the spread.
attributes.background: I want you to give 3mths off sentence due to the harsh strict conditions our family members are having to face due to the covid 19 strict regime and bang up

rejection.details: Reducing sentences is a matter for the courts, but you may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567457
